definition: of or relating to or characteristic of Portugal or the people of Portugal or their language, the Portuguese language
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or characteristic of Portugal or the people of Portugal or their language
= example: of or relating to or characteristic of Portugal or the people of Portugal or their language
= synonyms: Lusitanian
noun
- the Portuguese language
= example: the Portuguese language
- collectively, the people of Portugal
= example: collectively, the people of Portugal
